src:
Hasil Pertandingan Persija Jakarta vs Tira Persikabo: Skor 2-0
03 Nov 2019, 17:49 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Persija Jakarta dan Tira Persikabo bertemu dalam laga Shopee Liga 1 2019 pekan ke-26, Minggu (3/11/2019). Dalam laga yang dihelat di Stadion Patriot Candrabhaga, Kota Bekasi ini, Persija menang dengan skor 2-0.
Tambahan tiga poin membuat Persija Jakarta naik ke peringkat 14 dengan raihan 27 poin. Adapun bagi Tira Persikabo hasil ini menjadi laga ke-11 mereka tanpa kemenangan yang membuat mereka tertahan di peringkat tujuh dengan jumlah 37 angka.
Persija sudah tampil menekan sejak awal babak pertama. Pasukan Edson Tavares tampil mendominasi dan menggempur lini pertahanan Tira Persikabo dari segala lini.
Namun, sejumlah peluang yang dihasilkan masih mampu diantisipasi Tira Persikabo. Pada menit ke-33, Persija harus kehilangan Rohit Chand yang ditarik keluar karena cedera. Sandi Sute kemudian menggantikan pemain asal Nepal itu.
Setelah masuk, Sandi Sute langsung mengancam gawang Tira Persikabo. Namun, Sandi Sute gagal memaksimalkan umpan terobosan dari Joan Tiomas setelah dalam posisi satu lawan satu dengan kiper Angga Saputro. Hingga peluit panjang tak ada gol yang tercipta dalam babak pertama.
Memasuki paruh kedua laga, Persija semakin agresif melancarkan serangan. Pada menit ke-52, tim tuan rumah akhirnya membuka keunggulan melalui aksi sundulan Xandao setelah memanfaatkan umpan Heri Susanto.
Gol tersebut membuat Persija semakin percaya diri mengendalikan permainan. Pada menit ke-72, giliran Marko Simic yang mencatatkan namanya di papan skor. Simic, yang mendapatkan umpan silang jarak dekat dari Heri Susanto, melepaskan sundulan yang gagal diantisipasi kiper Angga Saputro.
Pada menit ke-81, Tira Persikabo mendapatkan peluang untuk memperkecil ketertinggalan melalui titik putih. Prisca Womsiwor melepaskan tendangan yang mengenai tangan Xandao sehingga wasit memberikan tendangan penalti untuk Tira Persikabo.
Sayang, Ciro Alves yang menjadi eksekutor gagal melaksanakan tugasnya. Bola hasil tendangan penalti kaki kanannya berhasil ditepis Andritany Ardhiyasa.
Di sisa waktu, Tira Persikabo tetap berjuang untuk memperkecil ketertinggalan. Namun, sejumlah peluang yang dihasilkan mampu diantisipasi barisan pertahanan Persija Jakarta. Tak ada gol tambahan sampai peluit panjang dibunyikan wasit.
text:
Match Results Persija Jakarta vs Tira Persikabo: Score 2-0
Nov 03 2019, 17:49 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Persija Jakarta and Tira Persikabo meet in the 2019 Shopee League 1 match week 26, Sunday (3/11/2019). In the match held at the Patriot Candrabhaga Stadium, Bekasi City, Persija won with a score of 2-0.
An additional three points make Persija Jakarta rose to 14th place with 27 points. As for Tira Persikabo, this result became their 11th match without a win which kept them in seventh place with 37 points.
Persija has appeared pressing since the beginning of the first round. Edson Tavares's troops appeared to dominate and attack Tira Persikabo's defense line from all fronts.
However, a number of opportunities generated were still able to be anticipated by Tira Persikabo. In the 33rd minute, Persija had to lose Rohit Chand who was pulled out due to injury. Sute Sute then replaces the player from Nepal.
After entering, Sandi Sute immediately threatened Tira Persikabo's goal. However, Sandi Sute failed to maximize the breakthrough bait from Joan Tiomas after being in a one-on-one position with goalkeeper Angga Saputro. Until the long whistle no goals were created in the first half.
Entering the second half of the match, Persija increasingly aggressive attack. In the 52nd minute, the home side finally opened the scoring through Xandao's header after using Heri Susanto's pass.
These goals make Persija more confident in controlling the game. In the 72nd minute, it was Marko Simic's turn to register his name on the scoreboard. Simic, who got a close-range cross from Heri Susanto, fired a header that failed to be anticipated by goalkeeper Angga Saputro.
In the 81st minute, Tira Persikabo had the opportunity to reduce the gap through the white dot. Prisca Womsiwor fired a shot that hit Xandao's hand so the referee gave a penalty kick to Tira Persikabo.
Unfortunately, Ciro Alves who became the executor failed to carry out his duties. Andritany Ardhiyasa, Andritany Ardhiyasa's right-footed penalty kicks the ball.
In the remaining time, Tira Persikabo still struggling to reduce the lag. However, a number of opportunities generated were able to anticipate the Jakarta defense Persija. There were no additional goals until the referee's long whistle sounded.
